name: Girbal
description:
"Girbal" is a single player sci-fi Puzzle platformer in which the player solves various puzzles including matching sequences, object size manipulation, and much more.
Poor Girbal's ship has been gobbled up and now Girbal is trapped inside the space monster! With the player's help, Girbal must travel through an assortment of other derelict ships the great catfish has to collect the parts he needs to fix his ship and make his escape. In order to complete the challenging puzzles barring his way, you will have to rely on a number of tools such as a grappling hook, jet-pack, gravity well generator, and more to overcome these obstacles. The player will get to navigate through various environments from sleek luxurious cruisers to rugged industrial cargo haulers, each themed with new and exiting themes of puzzles.
